import { useState } from "react"; const Amanot = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("deposit"); const paymentMethods = [ { name: "bKash", logo: "/path/to/bkash-logo.png" }, { name: "NOGOD", logo: "/path/to/nogod-logo.png" }, { name: "Rocket", logo: "/path/to/rocket-logo.png" }, { name: "Upai", logo: "/path/to/upai-logo.png" }, ]; // Channels data const channels = [ { name: "Bajipay", logo: "/path/to/bajipay-logo.png" }, { name: "Speedpay", logo: "/path/to/speedpay-logo.png" }, ]; // Amount data const amounts = [ { amount: 500 }, { amount: 1000 }, { amount: 1500 }, { amount: 2000 }, { amount: 5000 }, ]; return (
{/* Tabs with Full Width Background Image */}
{/* Deposit Form */} {activeTab === "deposit" && (

); }; export default Amanot;
